faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.contactInfo: If you have more questions, feel free to contact us via email, phone, or online service.
faq.question1: Why Should You Buy Car From Us?
faq.answer1: At present, we have accumulated: 11000+ export vehicles, 50+ export countries, 100+ distribution partners, 60+ professional service teams!
faq.answer2: The contract will list the payment method, our receiving bank, delivery time, product information, etc. Within three days after signing the contract, you need to pay the deposit.
faq.question3: How to do the inspection for the car before shipping?
faq.answer3: We will take a very clear video for customers before shipping. If customers still worry about the quality, we can find a professional third-party inspection company, but the fee must be paid by the customer.
faq.question4: Does the price you quote include all fees?
faq.answer4: CIP and CIF include transportation costs to the port, but customs clearance must be done by you. If you need help, we can assist with that.
faq.question5: Can I have a price list of all your models?
faq.answer5: Since we have a large number of models and prices change often, the list price may not be accurate. Provide a list of models you need, and weâ€™ll give an accurate quote.
